data.comment: The match has started at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Rotherham move into a 1-0 lead through a Matt Crooks header.
In the minute 9, At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Tommy Rowe has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jamie Lindsay for Rotherham has been booked by Leigh Doughty and receives a first yellow card.
Rotherham take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Michael Smith.
The first-half has come to a close in Rotherham.
In the minute 45, Matthew Olosunde (Rotherham) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
The second half has started at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Jack Hunt with Famara Diedhiou. This is the first substitution made today by Dean Holden.
Bristol City make their second substitution with Adrian Mariappa replacing Zak Vyner.
Chris Brunt is on a sub for Tyreeq Bakinson for Bristol City.
In the minute 65, Paul Warne is making the team's first substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Freddie Ladapo replacing Kyle Vassell.
Han-Noah Massengo is replacing Adam Nagy for the away team.
The away team replace Antoine Semenyo with Opi Edwards.
The match has come to a close in Rotherham. The final score is 2-0.
Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a second substitution, with Billy Jones replacing Jamie Lindsay.
Wes Harding is replacing Matthew Olosunde for Rotherham at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Paul Warne is making the team's fourth substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with George Hirst replacing Michael Smith.
